title: Cambodia, Thai Clashes Continue After Trump Ceasefire Claim
description: Thailand said it will continue military action against Cambodia to eliminate “harm and threats,” stepping up rhetoric even after US President Donald Trump claimed to have brokered a new ceasefire.
content: Thailand said it will continue military action against Cambodia to eliminate “harm and threats,” stepping up rhetoric even after US President Donald Trump claimed to have brokered a new ceasefire.
